entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 01:09 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
